name: Let's Ride Best in Breed 3D
description:
Create and care for your own horses, grooming and feeding them. Then it's time to take them out to practice their jumping skills. Saddle up for fun!

Features

• Raise your foals into beautiful horses to grow your stable.
• Choose from 25+ breeds and customize your horse with hundreds of different coat variations.
• Participate in the StreetPass beauty contest.
